name: Please Purchase Pogos
description:
Sell as many pogos as possible!

- And earn Schmeckels!

Keep the queues below four people!

- Or suffer claustrophobia!

Click on the costumers to see their desired pogostick.

Select a match from the conveyers and hand it over.

Project Lead: Mads Bock.

Programmer: Christian "Bimmer" Møllnitz.

Brainstorming: Lars Sørensen.

Sprites: Mads Kaagaard.
